comments:
I20050215-2300

- create new Java Project, switch to Java Perspective when asked
- open Help view and detach it
- create new class p.A, close the editor
- in the Package Explorer, select A.java and press the Delete key
- confirm deletion with "Yes"
=> the exception below is logged, confirmation dialog stays up, file gets deleted

- press "Yes" again
=> Unexpected Exception in Refactoring, because the file is alredy deleted

We unnecessarily cast to WizardDialog where IWizardContainer was sufficient 
for all our calls. I made the change and it should be OK now.
